name: 丁振卿
objective:
電路學主要是介紹「電源」、「電阻」、「電晶體」、「電容」、「電感」等基本電子元件的組合應用， 分成提供電力的主動式元件「電壓源」與「電流源」，還有消耗電力的被動式元件「電阻」，所組成的電路可簡單分成 由「電源」、「電阻」、「電晶體」所組成的「靜態電路」與 由「電源」、「電容」、「電感」所組成的「動態電路」。 電子在電路中的流動行為與物體質量的流動行為相似，電路中的克希霍夫電流定律 (KCL) 等同於物體質量流動的連續方程， 也就是「電荷守恆定律」及「質量守恆定律」；電路中的克希霍夫電壓定律 (KVL) 等同於物體質量受重力或守恆力 (Conservative Forces) 作用下的位能變化。
Circuits mainly introduces the combined application of basic electronic components such as "power", "resistance", "transistor", "capacitor", "inductance" and so on. It is divided into the active components "voltage source" and "current source" that provide power. There is also a passive component "resistor" that consumes power. The circuit formed can be simply divided into a "static circuit" consisting of "power", "resistance", and "transistor" and a "power", "capacitor", and "inductance". "Dynamic circuit" composed of. The flow behavior of electrons in the circuit is similar to the flow behavior of the mass of an object. The Kirchhoff current law (KCL) in the circuit is equivalent to the continuous equation of the mass flow of an object, that is, the "law of conservation of charge" and "the law of conservation of mass"; The Kirchhoff voltage law (KVL) in the circuit is equivalent to the potential energy change of the mass of an object under the action of gravity or conservation forces (Conservative Forces).
schedule:
本課程將加入實作教學與 AI 輔助學習，並安排一位助教輔助教學，課程內容份量將視實際學生學習狀況做增刪調整。

課程簡介 (1 週)
電路概述 - Introduction to Electric Circuits (1-2 週)(Chapter 1)
電阻電路 - Resistive Circuits (3-4 週)(Chapter 2)
電阻電路應用 - Applications of Resistive Circuits (5-6 週)(Chapter 3)
系統分析 - Systematic Analysis (7-8 週)(Chapter 4)
期中考 (9 週)
儲能與動態電路 - Energy Storage and Dynamic Circuits (10-11 週)(Chapter 5)
交流電路 - AC Circuits (12-13 週)(Chapter 6)
交流電功率與三相電路 - AC Power and Three-Phase Circuits (14-15 週)(Chapter 7)
變壓器與互感 - Transformers and Mutual Inductance (16-17 週)(Chapter 8)
期末考 (18 週)
